description:
This is a library module offering the same set of functions
 defined by Microsoft Excel, under Logical Functions.

functions.name: and
functions.description: Returns TRUE if all its arguments are TRUE; FALSE if one or more arguments are FALSE.
functions.summary: Returns TRUE if all its arguments are TRUE; FALSE if one or more arguments are FALSE.

returns.description: TRUE if all its arguments are TRUE; FALSE if one or more arguments are FALSE.

functions.name: and
functions.signature: ($arg1 as xs:anyAtomicType, $arg2 as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:boolean
functions.description: Returns TRUE if all its arguments are TRUE; FALSE if one or more arguments are FALSE.
functions.summary: Returns TRUE if all its arguments are TRUE; FALSE if one or more arguments are FALSE.

returns.description: TRUE if all its arguments are TRUE; FALSE if one or more arguments are FALSE.

functions.name: if
functions.signature: ($logical_test as xs:boolean, $value_if_true as item()*, $value_if_false as item()*) as item()*
functions.description: Returns one value if a condition you specify evaluates to TRUE and another value if it evaluates to FALSE.
functions.summary: Returns one value if a condition you specify evaluates to TRUE and another value if it evaluates to FALSE.

parameters.name: logical_test
parameters.description: is any value or expression that can be evaluated to TRUE or FALSE.

parameters.name: value_if_true
parameters.description: the value that is returned if logical_test is TRUE.

parameters.name: value_if_false
parameters.description: the value that is returned if logical_test is FALSE.

returns.description: One value if a condition you specify evaluates to TRUE and another value if it evaluates to FALSE.

functions.name: or
functions.description: Returns TRUE if any argument is TRUE; FALSE if all arguments are FALSE.
functions.summary: Returns TRUE if any argument is TRUE; FALSE if all arguments are FALSE.

returns.description: TRUE if any argument is TRUE; FALSE if all arguments are FALSE.

functions.name: or
functions.signature: ($arg1 as xs:anyAtomicType, $arg2 as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:boolean
functions.description: Returns TRUE if any argument is TRUE; FALSE if all arguments are FALSE.
functions.summary: Returns TRUE if any argument is TRUE; FALSE if all arguments are FALSE.

returns.description: TRUE if any argument is TRUE; FALSE if all arguments are FALSE.
